column2: BRIEF-Packaging Corp Of America Announces 25 Pct Dividend Increase May 15 (Reuters) - Packaging Corp of America: * PACKAGING CORPORATION OF AMERICA ANNOUNCES 25% DIVIDEND INCREASE * PACKAGING CORP OF AMERICA - INTENDS TO INCREASE QTRLY CASH DIVIDEND ON COMMON STOCK TO AN ANNUAL PAYOUT OF $3.16 PER SHARE FROM $2.52 PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Packaging Corporation Of America Q1 Sales $1.7 Billion April 24 (Reuters) - Packaging Corp of America: * PACKAGING CORPORATION OF AMERICA REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS * Q1 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.55 PER SHARE EXCLUDING SPECIAL ITEMS * Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.88 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.53 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
